description.default: With this Web Part, you can copy and paste the code in a page and automatically benefit from a syntax highlighter to read the code. This Web Part supports many languages as ActionScript3, Bash/shell, ColdFusion, c#, C++, CSS, Delphi, Diff, Erlang, Groovy, JavaScript, Java, JavaFX, Perl, PHP, Plain Text, PowerShell, Python, Ruby, Scala, SQL, Visual Basic and XML.
